WhiteHat Jr. is an amazing app for coding that teaches young learners skills through small-group instruction. Children learn to code with an excellent curriculum that will build their foundational coding knowledge, and then move on to more advanced coding concepts and technologies. This app is also suitable for learning for younger kids in the context of play. Kids can learn to code with visual programming languages that offer block-based code.

WhiteHat Jr. app offers the best learning experience for any child who is learning to code for the first time. The curriculum is designed to teach people to solve problems, in real time, using JavaScript and Python. The courses include lessons that are based upon real-world examples like robotics challenges, how to design web apps, and data visualization, and machine learning algorithms. The instructors and teachers are using the courses as a platform for sharing and learning to build a community of young tech innovators. Students are taught to leverage AI to design their software. The platform is a two-pronged effort: teach coding while teaching cutting-edge tech like Data Science and real-world Machine Learning. The classes are designed to pair students with experienced experts on each front, so they take a hands-on approach to learning and problem solving.
